snippet: All too often, such care for Americans is shoddy or contrary to a patient’s wishes.
abstract: Editorial decries flaws in medical system, including Medicare and Medicaid, that make it difficult for patients to obtain quality end-of-life services; welcomes changes being rolled out by New York State and Institute of Medicine intended to help protect patient rights and improve access to community and home care.
lead_paragraph: All too often, such care for Americans is shoddy or contrary to a patient’s wishes.

headline.main: Care at the End of Life
